thread.title: Harbhajan, Azharuddin visit Navjot Sidhu in the hospital
thread.title_full: Harbhajan, Azharuddin visit Navjot Sidhu in the hospital - Sports

author: A Correspondent
title: Harbhajan, Azharuddin visit Navjot Sidhu in the hospital
text:
Veteran Indian spinner Harbhajan Singh and former Indian captain Mohammad Azharuddin visited Navjot Singh Sidhu at the Indraprastha Apollo Hospital in Delhi.
The recovering former Indian cricketer posted pictures on a social networking site with both the Indian cricket stalwarts.

Pic Courtesy/ Navjot Singh Sidhu's Twitter account 
Navjot Sidhu, or as he is fondly called 'Sherry Paaji', posted the picture with Bhajji along with the caption - "Lucky Day for both ! One on way to recovery.. Other on way to 500 wickets !"

Pic Courtesy/ Navjot Singh Sidhu's Twitter account 
Five days ago on October 8th, Mohd Azharuddin visited Sidhu and the latter also posted a picture with him captioning it - " Old Gold, old wine, old friends - still the Best!"
Sidhu was suffering from acute deep vein thrombosis (DVT) and was admitted to the hospital.
